Hi, this works really fine on all computers in my house, and in my GF's house (trough router and trough wireless router) works even on lan PC's. Only problem in the map "apartments" when im outside on the roof or in the street i hear a realy loud and annoying hissing noise(on all the installs) tryed to edit the audio settings but nothing helps, the pcs use different soundcards with newest drivers... Does anyone know what could be wrong?

I think the sound is jacked,you get loud hissing and cracking noises,rebuilding audio cash doesnt help,It is very playable though.other than the sound trouble this is the Best L4D torrent ive seen,you can use addons An mods.Wish Quach could redo it with a sound fix or something,Im not smart enough to figure it out.
This looks fine. I can't wait to finish the download. Been playing L4D since fall 2009.. and been out for a year now.. Can't wait to play co-op:D
For those of you with sound errors, open up the console by pressing ~, and type in snd_rebuildaudiocache. This should fix it, as it fixed it for me.

Hey A_Quach, First I'd like to thank you for uploading this file; it saves me alot of time, so thnx :)

I'll be hosting a lan party next week for 5-6 people, is there anything I should know about? I'm a total noob when it comes to programming and such so I'd greatly appreciate it if you could give me some tips and hints.

cheers!
